text:
Предыстория, побывали в большом количестве стран (начиная от мальдив, оаэ, Европы, заканчивая турцией и египтом) думали хуже египта не увидим, а нет) 
Новый год решили провести в новом месте, выбрали Шри Ланку. Да, мы привыкли к сервису и готовы за него всегда платить.
Все приключение началось с заселения в номер. Мы взяли номер с собственным бассейном. При заселении обнаружили пустой мини бар. Он реально был пустой, 5 звезд отель) При просьбе его заполнить-нам сказали что его придется оплачивать(что само собой разумеется и мы это понимаем). Но смех, нам пополнили через часа
три минибар)

Что касается обслуживания. Скорее всего на
Шри-Ланке его нет или не дотягивает до уровня, хотя сеть марриот славится своим
обслуживанием.
-постоянно нужно вылавливать официантов,
выпрашивать себе напитки или что-то подобное!
В первый день, попросили в обед принести виски и колу) Пол часа ждали, пять раз просили, на шестой раз истерика уже началась))) говорим, в чем проблема принести? Мы заплатим)))) ответ - а у нас колы нет, есть только пепси и после уже конфликта нам родили после шестой просьбы
пепси и виски))))
-несут бутылку открытого пива минут 10, при
пустом баре, про какие-то коктейли можно
промолчать, там по пол часа ждать надо
- В ОДИН ИЗ дней пребывания нам вообще сказали:
Пепси кончалось, и северап! Но при этом на следующий день пепси появился на столе у местных гостей ) только когда спросили почему у них есть, а для нас нет, нам принесли пепси) ПЯТЬ ЗВЕЗД ОТЕЛЬ! 
- вся еда с перцем, если вы не готовы есть
Сутра до вечера условные острые крылышки kfc )))) то вам не сюда
Это было мучение найти блюдо без перца, конечно мы не рассчитывали на турецкий олин но такого нигде не видели, на третий день просто аппетита даже ходить в ресторан не было. Все под местный контингент, вся кухня индийская. 

Мы прилетели с ребенком. Найти что-то поесть для Ребенка- мучение, все же острое невероятно. Детского меню нет вообще

Пляж это отдельная тема. Напоминает дальние времена черноморского побережья. Осталость еще что бы Раков с рыбой продавали)  Приставучие люди, с просьбой чтото купить.
Черепах вообще сначала сказали посмотреть за 1000 руб с человека, но потом за троих взяли всего лишь 8 долларов. 

постельное белье чистое. Но...допустим ушные палочки, ватные диски-приходится
Выпрашивать. На 3 людей 2 больших полотенца. А на третий день нам оставили только одно полотенце вообще на троих. Выпрашивали пол дня второе. Душевая кабина ок, чистая. Сама ванна течет струей) Это стандарт 5 звезд? Когда ты платишь, не очень маленькие деньги-ты ждешь какого-то сервиса и выбираешь Шератон.

Но как оказалось его тут нет, элементарного.
Даже дав на чай официанту, или кому-то из
персонала, тебя забывают через 5-10 минут)

А Новый год ? Мы же за ним прилетели.
Бронировали накануне стол определенный, когда на деле пришли на ужин, нам дали стол где-то на задворках, мы стали говорить, что бронировали стол абсолютно в другом месте, нам экстренно его перенесли рядом с тем местом где должен был стоять наш стол, а за реально нашим столом посадили других людей. И вот так во всем!

Сервис это не сюда, для знающих людей и
видевших много стран, не стоит, лучше за эти же деньги (за тот же номер -600к за 4 дня) полететь на мальдивы, где все будет топ!!!!
title: Худший сервис , не понимаю отзывы на пять звезд, либо люди не знают какой должен быть сервис в 5 звезд отелях

text:
We stayed at this hotel recently, and unfortunately, our experience was marred by a very concerning incident. My son sustained an injury during our stay, which required medical attention. After we arrived in Colombo, we had to consult another doctor for further treatment. It was a stressful and upsetting experience for our family.

What disappointed us the most was the lack of follow-up from the hotel management after we checked out. Despite the seriousness of the situation, no one reached out to inquire about my son's condition or offer any support. This level of indifference was deeply disheartening and not what we expected from a reputed establishment.

Furthermore, it seems this incident could have been prevented if the pool and surrounding areas were regularly inspected for potential hazards. This raises serious concerns about the hotel’s safety measures and commitment to guest well-being.

While my son is now recovering, the lack of accountability and empathy from the hotel has left us feeling incredibly disappointed. I hope the management takes this feedback seriously and prioritizes guest safety and care in the future.
title: Safety Concerns and Lack of Care from Management

text:
We recently had a group outing of 50 people on 07/09/2024 and decided to have lunch at what is supposed to be a "five-star" hotel. Unfortunately, the buffet was a huge disappointment from start to finish.
Starting with the soup—it was completely tasteless, lacking any depth or flavor. Moving on to the salad corner, there were barely any options available. The only decent item was the corn salad. The fish salad was another letdown; the fish pieces were so dry and unappealing, they looked and tasted far from fresh.
For the main course, the only rice option available was plain rice. Not even fried rice or anything remotely interesting to choose from. Only spaghetti was found tasty at main dish. The chicken was also disappointing—only a few boiled pieces, and when they were finished, we had to wait a frustrating 15-20 minutes for a refill. This delay in service for such basic dishes was unacceptable, especially for a large group.
The dessert corner was slightly better compared to the rest of the buffet, but even then, some items were not tasty at all. The sago pudding, caramel, and watalappan were especially bad, lacking any real flavor.
Overall, the buffet was severely lacking in variety, quality, and service. For a five-star hotel, we expected much more in terms of options and taste. This lunch buffet was definitely not worth the price, and our entire group left feeling disappointed. Would not recommend for a large group or anyone expecting a true five-star experience.
title: Disappointing Sheraton Buffet Experience

roomTip: Many better options with good value nearby the area. Stay away!
text:
The stay was far from satisfaction. The hotel is in the middle of nowhere, no shops, no restaurants around. It’s indeed not a real resort as there is just a small swimming pool as facility. Beach is close, but there will be no beach chairs/towels offered by the hotel. The beach is not under the hotels’ supervision. There are many outside local vendors beyond, who try hard to sell you their water sports, massages, etc.
Not just I didn’t receive a warm welcome from the hotel as other hotel, there was an serious (arrogance) issue on general staffs attitude. There was an incident to me that staffs were unfriendly showing me the direction to checkin, even I asked for. No recognition of elite members were received. You have to use your SNA if you want to have a possible upgrade. The worst thing was 99% of the time at the stay would be no wifi working in your room. The GM (Mr. Xxxx, who I was able to WhatsApp, cut his conversation off from my message without any reason. It was kinda odd and impolite to do so. The GM, who took over the position 5 months ago, put himself away from his duty as he didn’t try to do anything during the confrontation with me. I suppose he will send me a message like, “I am sorry for what happened, and hope to have improvement during your next stay”.
The age of hotel was not old but the maintenance was terrible! Stains could be seen on the sofa, water was dripping at toilet hose.) I have no comments on food as I was not feeling a good hospitality from most of the staffs. Electricity was totally cut at 12pm as its like the hotel tried to kick me out despite the 4pm late checkout was confirmed. Chat room with Bonvoy App was cut too! That moments were like in prison!
In conclusion, I do NOT recommend this hotel and will never return. My decision to stay this time was a total mistake!
title: Hotel with arrogant staff, incapable GM

text:
Начнём с того,что я бронировали номер с видом на океан(в комментариях указывали выше этажи)По факту заселили на первом этаже с боку где не видно океан,потому что растительность.Когда я просила меня пересилить, мне сказали утром что нибудь попробуют предложить,а утром сказали, что всё номера заняты и только 17го числа будут, а у меня выезд 19го
И тогда мне предложили номер на 4 этаже с доплатой 150$ в сутки(750$)Мне пришлось доплатить, но когда я оплатила,то узнала от других постояльцев,что  этот номер им предлагали по 100$ в сутки доплатить, когда я обратилась к девочки с ресепшн, она сказала, что предлагала им полулюкс,но на 4 этаже нет полулюкса,там только 2 люкса и с видом на океан или гарден.Девочки которые брали номер гарден вью,получили океан ошен вью на 5 этаже без какого-то апгрейд,а те кто оплачивал получил на 1 этаже номер 124.Уборка номеров)да это ещё тот крест, бегать прийдется пол дня всего одно и тоже (оду минуту)пока сама не пойдешь и не кинешь полотенца в корзину их тележки. text:
Плюсы отеля - очень неплохой завтрак, ужин. Шведский стол. Очень изобильный. Есть и морепродукты , и местная кухня. Очень вкусно. 
Также хочется отметить традиционное для сети Марриот качество постели. Спалось на нем прекрасно. 
Пляж в этом месте отличный. Можно спокойно купаться - волны не такие сильные. Всё очень живописно , если пройти налево и направо. 
Теперь о недостатках. К сожалению, их больше. Персонал очень не вежлив, чувствовалось, что тебе здесь не рады, делают одолжение. Наигранные улыбки. В день выезда чуть позже 12 на несколько минут персонал стал стучаться в дверь и требовать освободить номер. Разве это достойно такой сети отелей ? 
Когда попытался расплатиться на ресепшн картой Юнион Пэй, персонал сказал, что терминал для российских карт не работает. Хотя, в других местах и отелях на Шри-Ланке всё работало без проблем и удавалось оплатить везде. Такое поведение я объясняю неклиенториентированностью, что опять же, очень странно для отеля такой сети, как Марриот и для сервиса. 
Также я хочу отметить, что в этом отеле не оказалось ортопедических подушек или любых других подушек - при попытке узнать про эту возможность, мне грубо ответили , что других подушек нет и всё. В общем, за персонал, сервис и его отношение - жирный минус и плохая оценка
title: Из плюсов - отличный завтрак и пляж

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for sharing your feedback following your recent visit to Sheraton Kosgoda Turtle Beach Resort. 

At the onset, we sincerely apologize for not meeting your expectations. The reservations were made two days before your arrival, and the travel agent cancelled the booking as you didn't arrive as per the initial booking. When you visited the property, we had to liaise with the travel agent and make a fresh booking to accommodate you. This caused the delay as there was communication between the hotel reservation and the travel agent. However, our team did their utmost best to allocate the rooms as early as possible.
 
Regarding the reception air conditioning, I would like to educate you about the architectural aspect of the resort. We are a beachfront property, and taking advantage of the same, the lobby is designed so that the breeze will flow across the reception to the lobby entrance. However, as Sri Lanka is a tropical country, there could be days when the humidity is above average. During such days, we accommodate our guests in our Sho lounge, allowing them to enjoy snacks and beverages until the rooms get ready. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused to you upon your arrival. 

As clarified before, the travel agent cancelled your initial reservation; hence, we have sold those king-bed rooms, and upon arrival, the availability was only for twin rooms. As you requested, the rooms should be upper floor rooms too, so we were compelled to offer those twin rooms. I hope you will understand that the hotel is operating at its peak during December. 

The rooms are cleaned daily as per a schedule, and in the meantime, towels will be changed upon request, and the amenities will be replenished as well. However, if the rooms are in a Do Not Disturb state, the service will not be provided respecting the guest's privacy. 
We have multiple outlets for our guests to enjoy any alcohol/ non-alcohol beverages. It is a practice that we do not allow the guests to bring their alcohol into the public venues of the property. 

Kindly note that the beach is public, and the vendors selling sun loungers outside the hotel fence are beyond our control. Plenty of sun loungers are available on our pool lawn for sunbathing, which many guests enjoy throughout their stay. 

As a responsible hospitality service provider, it is our duty to look after all our guests and to ensure that they have a pleasant stay with us. Our team offered service recovery for the mishaps that occurred due to the reservation cancellation. However, we take your feedback very seriously and address it with all departments concerned to ensure we mitigate the shortcomings as we progress. 

Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused. We sincerely hope this experience will not deter you from visiting us in the future. 

Sincerely, 
Mano Gunasekera
General Manager
placeInfo/address: 1 Okanda Road, Hiddaruwa, Naape Hiddaruwa, Naape, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Это не то место куда стоит ехать, посмотрите другие отели
text:
Самый наихудший отдых в данном отеле. ни по каким параметрам не тенят на 5 звезд.                                                                                                                                       1) По прилету тур оператор сообщил что мест бронированных еще в мае в данный отель нет, у шератон овербукинг, нас разместили в другой отель, но так как мы ехали с большой группой друзей, половина из которых прибыли через 2 дня, мы настояли что бы нас вернули в Шератон, потом о чем сильно пожалели.            
2)По приезду в Шератон админы  с респешна продержали нас 4 часа в жаре т.к. в ресепшн нет кондиционеров, ссылаясь на то что тур компания не подтверждает наш заезд и всякие разные причины вплоть до того что "мадам" с ресепшена заявила что мы вообще безденежные что бы о чем то спорить с ними. Не могу сказать что у нас такой маленький багаж знаний по отелям, но даже в каком то guest house других стран админы не вели себя на столько мерзко, сколько позволили себе в достаточно известной сетке отелей всего мира. Были в культурном шоке от встречи.                                                                                          
3)Далее были бронированы номера с 1 большой кроватью "кинг сайз", хочу еще раз напомнить у нас идет ранее бронирование, чего в нашем случае, а нас 14 человек парами, спали как брат и сестра на разных кроватях.                                                                      4) Номера убирают по желанию персонала, когда захотели и что в номере посчитали нужным убрать. Не доставляют мыло мойку, полотенца не меняют, на 4 день пребывания пришлось обращаться в ресепшн, и это обращение было исполнено всего лишь 1 раз. Что не соответствует уровня 5 звездочного отеля.                                                                                                                                            5) у бассейна со своими напитками запрещено находиться, надо платить. Были удивлены такому сервису.                                                                                             
6) на пляже за шезлонги и зонты отдельно оплачиваешь. Хотя первые 3 дня мы были в Мариоте (одна и та же сетка отелей) там на пляже охранники подбегали забирали окурки и жестяные банки от пива что бы бросить их в урну не то что платить за шезлонги.                                                                                                     
7) персонал на ресепшене злопамятный! после такой встречи пару админов  отворачивались видя нас делая вид что нас нет. благо там 3 стойки.                                                 
Вот это все что касаемо данного отеля. По еде в принципе относительно нормально, персонал в ресторане дружелюбный, без проблем можно было сделать доставку до номера.                                                                                            и небольшой PS при выходе с отеля мы познакомились и подружились с замечательным гидом Сарат Watsapp +94770805223 организованные им экскурсии обошлись нам почти в два раза дешевле, чем предлагал туроператор от фирмы. Человек он очень приятный, не навязывает ничего, чуть владеет русским. Если надо куда то съездить он откликается сразу. Обращайтесь.              
 И далее обращение непосредственно к Вам Мистер Mano Gunasekera, General Manager, Sheraton Kosgoda Turtle Beach Resort: Вы отвечаете только на положительные отзывы?! От Вас лично нам 20 отдыхавшим у вас в отеле гостей извинения не нужны!!! Примите к сведению, что ваш персонал и Вы лично как старший менеджер не справляетесь со своими прямыми обязанностями, у вашего персонала нет элементарной этики по отношению к вашим гостям! Вы портите репутацию крупной сетке отелей по всему миру!!!!
title: Шератон который не тянет на 5 звезд и отзыв на гида

text:
Самый ужасный отель, что доводилось посещать. Если не хотите испортить себе отдых и сэкономить деньги не берите данный отель , есть с чем сравнивать на Шри-Ланке не в первой.. 
по порядку : 
Из плюсов встретили с барабанами + прохладительный напиток, пляж .. и все 

Минусы: 
Все включено - это нечего - точнее вообще нечего все строго в выделенное время только по расписанию с 6-30 до 10-30 завтрак, с 12-30 до15 обед, 19 до 22-30 ужин.. в баре все по расписанию - с 11-23 только лимонады, пиво, вино
Есть еще бар в нем с 19-23 так же лимонады, пиво , вино .. так же предлагают с 16-17 перекусы из сэндвичей и чай-кофе 

Все .. захотел перекусить в другое время плати - вся еда и напитки платная - и цены приличные так - хочешь быть сытым ешь в обед до отвала что бы с с 15-17 не помереть с голоду 

По еде нет нечего такого что б прям вау, довольно примитивное все.
Мини бара - нету - только за оплату если попросить за деньги покупай у них же в баре наполнят ..

Номера убиты - щеток нет, везите с собой. Из того что положили шампуни и гели остальных принадлежностей как принято в all inclusive нету .. все с собой 

Шезлонги на пляже платные 1$ час аренды 

В общем не стоит своих денег 
Ни какие это не 5* максимум тянет на 2-3

title: Тем кто собирается ехать туда, подумайте

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for sharing your experience following your recent visit to Sheraton Kosgoda Turtle Beach Resort.

At the onset, we apologize for the inconvenience caused during your stay with us. 

The room allocations are done based on the room category that you have selected. During your previous stay, you enjoyed a different category, and the same room was occupied during your stay. Hence, upon your request, our team respectfully denied your request. We have noted your concern about the availability of seafood dishes. The seafood options are primarily available on our a la carte menus and offered both at the Main and Olive restaurants. The layout of the buffet varies in different seasons and purely depends on the nationality mix of the hotel as we cater to a multi-national portfolio of guests during the peak season. We have set times for the restaurant operations, and we are more than happy to cater to our guests even if they are late for their meals. This will not differ from serving our guests the quality of cuisine that we offer at all times. 

Sri Lanka is a tropical country and experiences monsoon rains during specific periods of the year. Unlike other years, November was a month when we experienced a high rainfall, which caused the dampness. Also, the monsoon rain causes an increase in the breeding of mosquitos. However, our utmost priority is to protect our guests and associates. Keeping this in mind, we do fogging thrice a week to ensure the environment is safe for our guests to enjoy their holiday. 

It is our sincere desire to exceed the expectations of all our guests, and it saddens us to know that we have not been able to achieve it this time. Your feedback is well received, as it is essential to us in the process of continuous improvement in our product and services towards our guests.

We hope this experience will not deter you from visiting us in the future. 

At your service, we remain.

Best Regards,
Mano Gunasekera
placeInfo/address: 1 Okanda Road, Hiddaruwa, Naape Hiddaruwa, Naape, Kosgoda 80570 Sri Lanka
text: Отдыхали в этом отеле в феврале 2023 года, так как нам понравился океан, питание, спокойный отель решили в ноябре полететь обратно … Сразу по прилету нам предложили номер возле ресторана  … попросили менеджера Tarangi поменять нам номер.. так как мы жили здесь 16 дней и весь отель знали очень хорошо !!  Сказать  : что нам отказали.. это ничего не сказать … Ответ был: весь отель заполнен… потом обещание переселить через пару дней… В итоге, она стала нас избегать, при виде нас уходить … А отель действительно был полупустой. Разговаривали со многими русскими , оказывается всех селили в одном крыле.. С чем это связано ? Не понимаем … Настроение было испорчено… По поводу питания , было с чем сравнить. Если в феврале было много морепродуктов, каждый день были тематические ужины. То в ноябре из морепродуктов почти ничего не было, уменьшили даже места где стояла еда, на тарелках лежали блюда для несколько человек… если ты пришел чуть позже , то вероятность что то попробовать вкусное нулевая … Отелю требуется ремонт , везде грязь и сырость… Территорию за все время пребывания обрабатывали один раз от насекомых.. итог: уезжали все искусанные, хотя брали с собой брызгалки от укусов, но это не спасло .. Общее впечатление об отеле : это тройка … для Sheratona это самый худший отель … Поверьте , мы много путешествуем , и нам есть с чем сравнивать ..
title: Отдых в отеле февраль 2023 и ноябрь 2023 года

roomTip: С собой алкоголь, средства от комаров, беруши.
text:
Не советую.
Слышимость в номере колоссальная - слышно каждое слово соседей, детей играющих в холле.

Низкое качество алкоголя. Про то что входит в типо “все включено» вообще молчу, там то только шриланкийские напитки низкого качества, про то что можно заказать по меню - игристое с оценками в Vivino 3,3, просекко нет и Дон переньон за 500 €. Странно для отеля сети Marriott иметь такую плохую винную карту.
Магазинов поблизости где можно было бы купить хотя бы просекко - нет. 
И нет напитков без сахара.
Если вы не пьёте пепси и дешевый алкоголь - не берите all inclusive. 

По еде - мы ехали за тунцом, лососем и устрицами. Ничего подобного нет даже в меню alacarte. Только креветки, крабы и местные виды белых рыб.

По морю - Всегда большие волны, спокойного моря не было. 
Пляж не принадлежит отелю, территория отеля огорожена сеткой, за ограждением много местных «гидов» пытающихся впарить разные экскурсии. Ты лежишь у бассейна, а они собрались человек 5-10 и ждут когда ты выйдешь и подходят очень навязчиво.

Но самое ужасное - это слышимость в номерах, мы не высыпаемся. Это не про комфортный отдых, который ожидаешь от отеля сети Marriot.
И очень много Комаров!
title: Не рекомендую, никакой шумоизоляции, не комфортно, плохой алкоголь.

text: After 10 yrs I visited my motherland and I was expecting a lot more from this resort.  I’m a platinum member with marriott and has stayed in many different Marriott resorts and hotels all over the world, this was one of the worst hotels.  The pictures on the website are not accurate. Please don’t waste your money by staying at this resort.  There are far better hotels and resorts in SL for the money I spent. The hotel is old and not updated. The rooms and bathrooms are filthy, old and outdated.  It’s a shame that they can’t keep this property upto date.   There is a beach but you can’t really swim in it so it’s complete waste of time and money if you want beach access.  I have complained to the management team, all they did was make excuses and apologized. Didn’t  do anything else to compensate for my inconvenience.  We had booked 5 rooms and I had brought my family and relatives to spend time with me.  It was such a disappointment.  The staff was friendly and did the best they could under the circumstances.
title: Terrible hotel. Old, outdated and filthy

roomTip: la plage est minuscule avec des chiens errants en permanence à éviter. Ce n'est pas un véritable all inclusive : exemple mojito payant.
text:
Hygiène déplorable dans la chambre et la salle de bain qui était crasseuse. Rabinet de la baignoire cassé. Baignoire crasseuse. Des cafards se promenaient tranquillement. Le coffre fort n'était pas fixé comme dans toutes les chambres
On pouvait donc partir avec le coffre dans ses mains..
Aucune banque de froid au buffet par 30 degrés. Les glaces étaient fondues puis recongelées. Un ami a eu une intoxication alimentaire. Evitez les excursions, prix prohibitif et de plus le guide dormait..
Adressez vous à Frederico à l'extérieur du club qui est plus sérieux et bien moins cher. Présence de chiens errants qui ont attaqué avant notre séjour un ou deux touristes.
title: A fuir

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Guest,
We are very sorry to hear that your experience at our hotel did not meet your expectations. We take all feedback seriously, especially concerns regarding service and conditions. We understand your frustration and want to address your points.
We sincerely apologize if you felt the service was poor and the conditions were not up to standard. This is certainly not the experience we aim to provide our guests. We are also concerned by your statement about staff behavior and want to assure you that we do not condone any disrespectful conduct. We will investigate this matter thoroughly and take appropriate action.
Regarding the language barrier, we acknowledge that while many of our staff strive to communicate effectively with guests, English proficiency varies. We are working on improving language training for our team to enhance communication and guest experience.
We appreciate your feedback, even though it is critical. It provides us with an opportunity to identify areas for improvement. We are committed to providing a positive experience for all our guests and will take steps to address the issues you have raised.
We understand your disappointment and hope that you might reconsider your opinion in the future as we work to make the necessary improvements.
Sincerely,
Asanka Niroshan
Assistant Front Office Manager

ужас! отдыхаем в этом отеле,сегодня в последний день украли деньги 100$ и 100€. администрация отеля ничем не помогла.

title: theft

placeInfo/address: Beach Rd, Marawila 61210 Sri Lanka
text:
Отдыхали в этом отеле с мужем 11 дней в ноябре 2024, пишу отзыв, пока едем в аэропорт) что можно сказать, отель на тройку. Если вы были в Турции или Египте на «все включено» - сюда ехать не стоит) самый большой минус - еда. 90% мяса - острое. Раз в три дня дают говядину, так в основном только курица в карри, либо какая-то рыба типа минтая. Морепродуктов не увидите, раз в 2-3 дня могут быть кальмары и огрызки малюсеньких недоочищенных креветок. Если написано «паста с морепродуктами» - там будут макароны в соусе и 1% рыбы. Фруктов толком не было, наполовину зеленые арбузы и бананы, можешь быть папайя. Миллион видов острого риса, один вид картошки каждый день, пустые макароны (якобы паста). На завтрак всегда одно и то же - хлопья с молоком, омлет/яичница, булки. Хорошо, что дети в этот раз остались с бабушкой, им было бы просто нечего есть. 2 раза была пицца простенькая, которую тут же сметали. Захотите поменять отель - не сможете, будут уговаривать остаться, «наши гости всегда счастливы». Мы говорили с другими гостями, они не счастливы, не обольщайтесь) отдельно стоит упомянуть, что в промежуток с 16.30 до 17.30 обещают закуски для все включено)))) их либо нет, либо стоит одна тарелка каких-то овощей и тарелка с кексами на ВЕСЬ отель, это смешно) в первый наш день еще и стоял сотрудник смотрел, чтобы много не накладывали себе😂 потом мы пожаловались, вроде, убрали его. Мы с мужем алкоголь не пьем, брали колу, фанту или спрайт в баре, из автомата там все разбавлено водой. Один раз выцепили вкусный напиток с маракуйей, на следующий день нам уже сказали, что это «welcomе» напиток не для «все включено»😄 все включено - это все включено, владельцы и администрация отеля, это обращение к вам) 

Из хорошего - неплохие номера, но сначала нам дали с раздельными односпальными кроватями номер (видя, что пара муж и жена), пришлось просить менять. Пол в номере красит ноги) убирались нормально, туалетную бумагу почему-то не давали😄полки не протирали в ванной точно, там у нас как умер муравей в первый день, так и лежал.  Приходят убираться в основном в самую жару, когда все прячутся от солнца, видимо, чтоб им говорили, что уборка не нужна) море хорошее, но бывают сильные волны, муж цепочку потерял. Лежаков хватает далеко не всегда, маленький пляж. Зато наливают газировку из бутылок) рядом с отелем есть пара ресторанчиков, можно поесть, мне понравилось в принципе, брала креветки, муж свинину, сказал невкусно. В «О2» угостили еще какой-то рыбой и мороженым) до Маравилы 40 минут пешком, но там особо ничего нет. На все экскурсии очень долго ехать, имейте ввиду! Анимации никакой нет, орущая музыка под ухом на ужинах. Бассейн хороший, но там плещутся вороны, можно подхватить что-нибудь 99%. Два дня в 6 утра косили газон прям у домиков с номерами, кошмар. 
Есть бильярд, большой и настольный теннис, можно взять велосипеды покататься, это плюс. Но большинство помещений и инвентарь убитые, требуют немедленной замены. 

В ноябре шли дожди почти каждый вечер, один день дождь был с обеда до самой ночи. А так всегда +29/+31. Народ улыбчивый, все стараются помочь, если обратиться с вопросом.
title: В общем, если вы хотите потратить деньги с умом, сюда ехать не стоит) отель чисто переночевать, на 4* не тянет.

text: We went there on 12/10/2024 for our annual trip.. even by 2.15 pm we could not get our rooms.   Had rotten rice and rotten fruit salad for dinner.. Even though it was a rainy day they didn't provide umbrellas to the rooms, when I asked for more than 10 times, we have received an umbrella after two hours. we have stucked inside our room during that time …and they have some thugs as receptionists there and they don't like to accept their mistakes….this is the worst hotel experience we have ever had..not recommend at all 🤮🤮🤮

placeInfo/address: Beach Rd, Marawila 61210 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Ja bitte nicht dieses Hotel buchen
text: Wir haben für ein Tag mit  Familie und verwandten  ( Kinder : 7 und 1 Jahr alt ) dieses Hotel gebucht mit Pool sowie Mittagessen. Hotel angekommen wurden wir mit welcome Drinks begrüßt und die Ambiente war ok. Da wir spät angekommen waren konnten wir direkt zum  Mittagessens Buffet. 10 min auf platzt hingesetzt überrannte uns mindestens 200 Leute aus Bangladesh. Sie hatten Firmen Ausflug. Einige blieben direkt am Buffet und bedienten ohne ein Löffel. 200 Tiere die noch nie essen gesehen haben. Andere Gäste hatten nur Schock. Wir ekelten uns weiter zu essen und der gebuchte relax Tag hat nicht mal angefangen. Wir sowie andere Gäste beschwerten sich an die zuständigen Hotel Personal. Sie sagten nur das sie auch Nix machen könne. Die hatten wohl für eine Woche das Hotel gebucht.  Ohne vernünftiges Mittagessen gingen wir weiter zum Pool wo uns versichert wurde das diese 200 Büffel erst 18 Uhr ins Pool kommen. Keine 30 Minuten später stiegen sie ohne entsprechende Bekleidung mit Shirt und Jeans oder was auch immer die anhaben ins Pool. Es war so ekelig. Wir waren öfters andere Hotels aber das haben noch nie erlebt.  Alle raus aus Pool und unsere Kinder direkt mit. Unsere Tagesausflug war in 2 stunden zu Ende mit ein Schock. Bei Hotel Manger beschwert aber er meinte auch das er Nix machen kann. Wir würden schöne Kekse bekommen für Abends Tee als  Entschädigung. Es war nur peinlich und lachhaft. Keine richtige Anlaufstelle für Beschwerden. Wir wurden mit Lächeln und Kopfnicken getröstet ohne eine vernünftige Lösung. Geld futsch Tag im Eimer. Liebe Gäste, wenn ihr vorhabt dieses Hotel zu Buchen tut es nicht. Kann nicht mal mangelhaft schreiben. Dieses Hotel ist schrecklich 👎🏽
title: Hotel des Graues 🤦🏽‍♂️👎🏽

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Mr./Ms. Das,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us following your recent stay at The Kingsbury, Colombo. We are truly sorry to hear that your experience did not meet the high standards we strive to uphold and that your visit left you feeling disappointed.

We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience regarding your room allocation and the confusion surrounding the laundry service. We completely understand how frustrating this must have been, especially at checkout, and regret that it affected your overall impression of your stay. Please rest assured that your concerns have been shared with our senior management and the relevant teams for a thorough review and immediate action.

We are also very sorry to hear about your interaction with our front office team. This is not reflective of the genuine hospitality and professional service we aim to offer all our guests, and your feedback is being taken very seriously.

To ensure your concerns are personally addressed, a member of our team will be reaching out to you shortly. In the meantime, if there is anything more you would like to share or if we can be of any further assistance, please feel free to contact us at crm@thekingsburyhotel.com. We would truly appreciate the opportunity to make things right and hope to welcome you back for a far more enjoyable experience in the future.

Warmest regards,
The Kingsbury, Colombo team
placeInfo/address: 48 Janadhipathi Mawatha, Colombo 00100 Sri Lanka
text:
Dear [Hotel Management/Customer Service Team],

I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to formally express my dissatisfaction regarding my recent stay at Kingsbury Hotel, Sri Lanka, from June 11 to June 16, 2025. While I had high expectations based on the hotel's reputation, my experience fell short in several key areas.

Check-In Experience: Upon arrival, the check-in process was relatively smooth; however, I was disappointed to find that the hotel could not accommodate the specific room I had originally opted for. This was my first indication that my stay might not meet my expectations.

Laundry Service Discrepancy: The most significant issue arose during my checkout. I had received a confirmed email outlining the room tariff, which included 4 pieces of laundry per day. Given my 5-night stay, I was entitled to a total of 20 pieces of laundry. Unfortunately, I did not utilize the laundry service during the first three days of my stay. However, on the 4th and 5th days, I submitted 13 pieces and 7 pieces of laundry, respectively.

At checkout, the billing staff initially requested payment for all 20 pieces of laundry. Subsequently, I was informed that I was only eligible for 8 pieces, as the hotel staff claimed that my lack of usage during the first three days limited my entitlement. Despite my attempts to clarify the situation and present the confirmed inclusion in my tariff, the staff remained unyielding and dismissive. As a result, I was compelled to pay for 12 pieces of laundry, amounting to LKR 5139.00, in addition to an extra USD 45 for the inclusion of the laundry service.

Staff Conduct: I must also address the demeanor of the front office staff during this encounter. Their attitude was not only unwelcoming but also hostile, which exacerbated an already frustrating situation. This lack of professionalism is concerning, especially for a hotel of your standing, and it detracts from the overall guest experience.

Conclusion: While Kingsbury Hotel is well-regarded among both local and international guests, my experience has raised concerns about the rigidity of staff policies and the overall guest service. I believe that addressing these issues is crucial not only for the hotel's reputation but also for the positive image of Sri Lanka as a travel destination.

I hope that my feedback will be taken into consideration to improve future guest experiences. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,

Kaustav Das
title: Feedback on My Recent Stay at Kingsbury Hotel, Sri Lanka

placeInfo/address: 48 Janadhipathi Mawatha, Colombo 00100 Sri Lanka
text:
Kingsbury is a huge disappointment!!
First of all, when we came by our car, there was no doorman to open the hotel doors or even the back doors of the car. I went there in the third week of March for my best friend's birthday. We were 4 friends in total, and it was our treat for the birthday boy. To my surprise, there was no staff to ask about where Harbour Court was, since it was our first time visiting The Kingsbury. Our first choice was our usual hotel which is a luxury 5-star hotel in Colombo; I prefer not to say their name on here and it is a top ranked hotel on this platform. Yet there were no proper staff or the ones available were very busy with foreign guests. I think they have no interest in serving local Sri Lankan people, where we felt very discriminated against. After asking a person seated on the lobby chairs, who I think was a guest too, we finally found out. We went to Harbour Court. Again, they disappointed me. I made a reservation around 2 pm by calling the hotel for the dinner buffet and asked to reserve a table with a view, that means a 4-pax table near the big glass window. They told me they would surely reserve the relevant table near the window. But the girl at the restaurant reception reserved a table far away from the window and very near to the buffet, where people were busy picking food. It made us very stressed because it was crowded, and we couldn’t even have a little private conversation because people in the food queue could hear us.
OK, that is bearable, we can forgive it. But I was very amazed to see that in this kind of luxury fine dining, there are no waiters. For the whole crowded restaurant, I could find only 3 or 4 managers wearing coats who had no interest in serving guest's requirements, they were just talking and laughing with each other. I saw only one waiter in a waiter suit. We wanted cool water for our glasses after coming to the table with the food. We wanted to say this to a waiter, but there was only one waiter, and I saw maybe three people with ties and white shirts serving others, but they were busy serving the other half of the restaurant. We were wondering, where are these people who are working? These are not fake stories, and I too couldn't believe that we had to face these awful things in this kind of a luxury hotel.

Then, finally, after a few minutes of looking for anyone, a manager came. I can’t remember his name, but he was a bit bald-headed. After asking, he went to bring cold water. Then again, they failed to meet our requirement. They brought OLU water instead of normal filtered water with ice. I think the bottle costs 400 rupees, but with tax and everything, it should be around 600, I guess. The manager brought three OLU water bottles instead of what we asked; normal filtered water with ice. Is there any intention to cost guests more by making profits cunningly? We had to use these OLU bottles because if we reject them, we would have waited another half an hour looking for a waiter to bring us water. I want to mention that one of the managers came and offered us the drinks menu. One of my friends politely said we’ll order later in the eating session because we wanted to. Shockingly, this guy came again and again, insisting that we order some cocktails by being a big headache. He kept recommending different kinds of drinks, disturbing our conversations. Since it was my friend's birthday, I went to the reception girl and requested to sing happy birthday to my friend. I want to mention that on the occasion, there were other people having birthdays and two girls and one boy were singing happy birthday to them. It was unusual they were busy doing that. Somehow, even after two requests, they forgot to wish my friend. It would have made his day!!! After two requests, I stopped asking them to sing and I dropped that idea, thinking never ever coming to this hotel again, and I will not recommend it to anyone. 

I want to strictly ask that, don't you guys care about your guests??? The reason I say that is because including myself, we are big fans of egg hoppers. The action station was queued with a lot of people willing to get hoppers. I think they should put two or more chefs to do that.

After all these things, the main part of the buffet is food, right? I thought we would forget all these shocking disappointments after eating good soothing food with some mouth-watering seafood. But I don���t know the reason, shockingly, we were so unfortunate because the food was extremely disappointing. Steamed rice and biriyani were the only rice options. Not even fried rice was there. Is Kingsbury an Indian hotel like Taj Samudra??? Because 60% of the food was Indian food! The beef was very chewy and not even slightly tender, resulting in me giving back my plate with that low quality beef. My friends strongly recommended that Kingsbury dinner buffet has more seafood varieties than other hotels, but being a seafood lover, I could barely find any seafood. I was wondering where this so-called legacy of Kingsbury has gone. So disappointing! The only seafood was some butter-fried pieces. Thinking something is better than nothing, I ate them. Again, as usual, it was disappointing. They had a very thin small fillet of fish under a big butter-fried layer. 
To be more specific, there was only chewy low-quality cuttlefish and fish with big layers of butter and oil. I mean, what is this guys? How can you make people feel mislead and take huge amounts of money for these low-quality food collections while claiming a very high standard five-star hotel? Then we came to the dessert section. Being a big ice-cream lover, I straightly went to the ice-cream kottu action station. To my huge disappointment, the guy in the dessert section said very rudely, "There's no ice cream kottu, and we can't provide it since the board of the ice cream kottu maker is broken and not freezing to be eligible to make ice cream kottu." Guys, this reflects a lack of attention to basic hospitality standards.  Can’t you guys try to repair it as soon as possible and provide the specific dessert again? Instead of being rude to guests. Then I tried to get normal ice cream, but the same rude guy serving ice cream was pouring scoops as little as laddus. Only two little scoops. It was disappointing to see such limited portions being served, especially for a high end buffet. Then the small chocolate pieces were finished, and only dark chocolate and mint chocolate was left, and they were not restocking for people. It’s very sad to see two tables away from us getting a birthday singing with a small cake but not us.

So, thank you very much Kingsbury for showing your true colors!! I am not coming to Kingsbury again and will not recommend it to others. These positive reviews about this Kingsbury are also very false because after paying the bill this manager guy came and asked from the four of us to write a good review with 5 stars mentioning his name. I felt very sad about these guys begging for good reviews on this platform. Finally, to whoever reading this, I wanna say I strongly advise others to reconsider before visiting Kingsbury!
title: A Huge Dissapointment about this Kingsbury

text:
Worst experience. 

Yesterday, we came for my best friend’s bride to be party just six of us. We made a reservation at Honey Beach Club for six people. When we made the reservation, we clearly asked what would happen if it rained. They assured us that if it rained, they would arrange seating in an indoor area.

From the beginning, it was a terrible experience. When I arrived, I went to the restroom with my friend, and there were three ladies in black uniforms. They were shouting without any discipline and rudely asked me to move. It was very uncomfortable. Is that what hospitality looks like in a star-class hotel? We felt like we were in a street restaurant.

After that, we returned to our table. When my other friends arrived with a cake, no one provided a knife or a side plate until we asked for it. We did not expect such poor service from a hotel of this standard.

Then, it started to rain, and we wanted to place an order, but no staff members were available. We waited, and as the rain got heavier, no one took responsibility for the guests. Eventually, we moved inside, and at least the F&B staff acknowledged us, but where were the managers? I saw one person in a full suit, but he didn’t even smile at the guests.

To make matters worse, all our drinks got caught in the rain, and instead of replacing them immediately, they brought the drinks  now mixed with rainwater back to our table. Can anyone drink that? We had to ask for new drinks, and only then did they provide them.

However, I want to appreciate one lady who helped us dry our clothes .her service was commendable.

I’m also a hotelier, which is why we chose this venue for such a special occasion, but it turned out to be the worst experience we’ve had at a star-class hotel. There were so many staff members in full suits perhaps managers but what’s the point of having them if they don’t lead their team or step in when guests are facing issues?

Why should we spend our money on this kind of service ?
title: Worst experience.

text:
I have been a loyal guest of the Kingsbury Hotel since its days as the Ceylon Continental in the early 2000s. Over the years, I have always admired the impeccable service and professionalism of the hotel staff, particularly the concierge team. Unfortunately, my recent experience has left me very disappointed.
Ahead of my trip to Sri Lanka, I emailed the concierge team on December 15th, 2024, requesting assistance with booking five first-class train tickets for my journey from Colombo to Ella on December 27th and for the return trip on December 30th. I also highlighted how their support in the past had been excellent. However, to my surprise, I did not receive any response neither a confirmation nor an explanation if they were unable to assist. I trusted that I would receive a confirmation or at least a reply in time, and because of that, I missed my planned trip to Ella entirely. I had to settle for traveling only to the southern region of the country instead, which was very disappointing as I had looked forward to this experience for a long time.
As a frequent visitor to this hotel every two years, I expected better communication, especially since the concierge team has previously been very reliable, even during peak seasons. If they were unable to arrange the booking, a simple response acknowledging my request would have been appreciated. I am deeply disappointed with the lack of communication this time, and I hope the management takes this feedback seriously. A hotel's reputation is built on consistency, and such lapses can leave even loyal guests questioning their future stays. VERRY DISSAPOINTED! I DON'T RECCOMMEND KINGSBURY AT ALL FOR PRE- PLANNED TRIPS!!
title: Disappointed with Poor Communication from Concierge!

text: Since the link shared by Indulgence takes me to TripAdvisor, I will put my review here. Please note that this review has nothing to do with staying at Kingsbury and is based purely on my experience ordering food on Christmas day. First of all, the arrangement for pick up and delivery at the hotel was a mess. I drove from Negombo to pick up the food at 10:30 a.m., the set time, but the food was not ready. We ordered 3 (1.5 kg each) herb and garlic roasted chicken with veggies but the portion of veggies was not worth the money. The chicken was bland and lacked flavour.  Was very disappointed with the food.
title: Disappointing

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Not recommended if you are seeking a clean place to stay.
text:
We stayed for 2 nights in rooms 210 and 212 from December 26 to 28, and it was a complete waste of money.
Recycled Food in Buffet: The dinner buffet had the same items as the next day’s breakfast and dinner. It felt like leftover food was being reused across multiple meals, which is completely unacceptable.
Uncleaned Mugs and Cups: The mugs and cups in the rooms were dirty and not properly cleaned, raising hygiene concerns.
Dirty Pillows and Towels: Pillows and towels had stains, and even the replacements provided were visibly dirty, with patches and marks.
Rusty and Smelly Bathroom: The bathroom was in terrible condition—rusty fixtures, dirty surfaces, and a strong unpleasant odor. It was impossible to use the bathroom comfortably.
Unsealed Water Bottles: The water bottles provided were unsealed, looking like they were refilled, which is highly concerning from a hygiene perspective.
Non-Functional Locker: The in-room locker was rusty and didn’t work at all, making it completely useless.
AC Turned Off: The air conditioning was inexplicably turned off on the second day at the buffet area leaving the room uncomfortably warm.
Poor Wi-Fi: Wi-Fi was only functional inside the room and did not work anywhere else in the hotel, which was highly inconvenient.
TV Remote Not Working: The TV remote didn’t work, which added to the frustration during our stay.
Unfair Extra Charges: We were charged extra for room service when we simply asked for replacements for the dirty towels and cups. This was not something we ordered, but a basic necessity due to their negligence.
No Toothbrush or Toothpaste: We were surprised to learn that the hotel doesn't provide basic essentials like toothbrush and toothpaste. When we asked, they told us they generally don't provide them. This is highly unusual as most other hotels provide these essentials as a standard service.
Despite paying Rs150,000+, the experience was far below what should be expected from any hotel. The lack of cleanliness, subpar food hygiene, and additional, unfair charges left us deeply disappointed. Not recommended at all.
title: Significant improvements are needed in hygiene, service

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Whatever you do avoid the street facing rooms
text:
I stayed here for 3 nights on a tour before having a final night which I booked on booking.com. The hotel was unclean and loud, and there was a Russian scuba diving school running out of the swimming pool, which I found interfered greatly with my use of the pool and exposed me to lots of second-hand cigarette smoke (smoking was freely allowed around the pool, which didn't suit me as I have bad asthma).

I elected not to stay at the hotel for my further booked night, as it was not what I was expecting and I didn't feel safe or comfortable staying here alone (ie, without my tour group). For the sake of clarity, I've divided the following into issues with the room and issues with the service (which was why I didn't feel safe/welcome) below.

Issues with the room (cleanliness/hygiene): 
Our toilet seat had blood stains on it and our bathroom was full of black mould. There was also black mould in the wardrobe. 
There were also dead bugs on the curtains. I understand that tropical climates such as Sri Lanka often mean bugs +++, but we did not have this problem with any of our other rooms in the country. 
Additionally, I ate at their breakfast buffet on the final morning and noticed a plate of food that was covered in insects. I pointed this out to a staff member who shooed them away and left the plate of food out for other people to eat. I had to be quite assertive about how this was unacceptable and this food was unsafe to eat before the plate was taken away from the buffet. 

Issues with the service:
When I went to speak to reception about the state of my room they were very rude. Basically I felt that I had been mislead by their listing on booking.com (which lists the hotel as 4 stars - it is actually 3 stars, which is quite generous), and I did not want to spend my extra night there. I offered a compromise solution: I was happy to pay the amount that they had paid this website - 20% and then cancel my room for a partial refund. They rejected this and said that they had a blanket policy of no refunds (they then asked me to formally cancel on the website so that they could re-sell the room, which I did not feel inclined to do, so evidence suggests that my cancellation 3-days in advance of the booking would not have left them out of pocket). They also refused to cancel for a man on my tour whose flight was changed and were quite rude during that conversation too.
Interestingly, throughout this whole conversation about me wanting to cancel my booking they did not once ask me why I was unhappy (principally the blood stains on my toilet seat and the mould, which was triggering my asthma), and they became aggressive and defensive. Later that day I had to get my tour guide to speak to the hotel about the issues with my room (as they basically refused to engage with me about this - to their credit they did replace the blood-stained toilet seat after my tour guide spoke to them). 
If you look at the 1-2 star reviews on this website you will notice that most of them have received aggressive/defensive replies from hotel management. I suspect that this review will prompt a similar reply. Rather than argue with unhappy guests they should consider asking for ways to improve and offering apologies to paying guests whose expectations were not met.
title: Unsanitary and unfriendly hotel in beautiful location

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
roomTip: take "ocean view" and not only first floor (better 2nd or 3th)
text:
Our Sri Lanka trip within 2 weeks: Colombo - Kandy - Ella - Udawalawe - Hikkaduwa - Colombo. This trip took us to this place: Coral Rock by Bansei 

Arrived with the driver in the hotel, the luggage was carried directly into the interior. The check-in took place sitting on the sofa. With a welcome-drink in my hand, I found it somewhat difficult to fill in the information on the sheet. A table or just the reception would be better suited. At check-in, the amount was deducted directly from the credit card provided at booking.com. This without asking. Too bad, I would have paid cash.
We have received an upgrade, we were very happy about that. The room and the bathroom were very large. We had in the bathroom also a bathtub with whirlpool bath (in such a warm place a bit superfluous, but a "nice to have"). The hotel area is clean. The ants in the room we could remove immediately. The breakfast buffet is great. A large selection of food. Fortunately, there is also a typical local corner with dahl, curry, etc. Various juices, fruits, sweets, typical American breakfast (with beans and sausages) as well as cheese and cold cuts (superfluous for me). Great!
Staff in the restaurant: The trainee are "discreetly ordered around" by the Chef de Service. The trainee do not speak with the guests (maybe they are not allowed). The Chef de Service show up at the guests and conduct small talk.
The cutlery is not completely changed at breakfast after each guest. Only the "used things" are renewed. The cutlery already lying on the table, which looks "still clean" is used again (for the next guest). This is very unhygienic! Please change this immediately. That's why (e.g.) the placemats were unhygienic. Teach your trainee! They do not know better then and make mistakes. Pity! We only booked B&B and decided to have once lunch at the hotel. It was okay. Nothing special. 
The front desk talks about the guests as they think you do not understand Singhalese. Stupid only if our colleague lives in Sri Lanka for years. 
The pool area is very nice. For towels you have to ask at the front desk. During the day, "a pigeon crapped on the bath towel". When I wanted to get a new bath towel, I first had to justify “why”. When I showed them the dirty cloth, I got a new one. Very elaborate and not service oriented. 
The stay was very pleasant. But in a tourist-town like Hikkaduwa, I expect more. The two ladies at the front desk are very nice and accommodating. The gentlemen are fine. In the hotel complex often only my partner was greeted. A "hello sir" when I am (as a woman) with my partner; is disrespectful.

Recommendations in Hikkaduwa:
Mom's Coral Beach Restaurant: Food was good, the music was very loud and the service was ok. 
Isira Coffee Shop (No 06 Waulagoda Road, Hikkaduwa 80240, Sri Lanka): Unbelievably good food and very nice hosts. A mix between locals and tourists. Here you must have been. Great!
title: Nice hotel with a developable "service quality"

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Sir/Madam,

We thank you for taking your time on posting a review on TripAdvisor about Bansei resort  We have noted the massaged made us by you and done the best to make your holiday a perfect as much as we could,

As per the booking we have offered you a nice Standard room at our property (No Sea view) it is very clearly mentioned in Booking.com (Room facilities and Description), and offered room is very clean checked by our housekeeper, we do change bed linen in the room on daily basis and provide turn down service every day in the evening for all our in-house guests.

Yes its road side room as per the booking and please to inform you that our balcony doors are sound proof in all non Sea view room category, When you talk with you, you mentioned that night time you kept Balcony doors open, of course if you keep open sound will come inside the room with small animals also can be come in side as we are tropical country.

As soon as you complained about the room cleanliness which was not up to your standard, we offered you a nice room change in an same floor same room Type as per our resort availability (Sea View room was fully booked) by apologizing but you refused anyway we were understood that your expectations were to be in a Sea View room Furthermore; we have offered the following arrangements in order to minimize your negative feeling towards about room location while staying at our resort.

We offered you a nice room change in higher Category Sea View room from Next day till departure and Booking was on Bed and Breakfast Basis however we offered you Dinner free of charge till you departure.

Hence we, as a leading hotel having a good will for years, our Guest relation officer, Housekeeper and, me communicated with you giving priority asking any possible requirements to make your holiday memorable one however All above offers you have refused.
We do apologize for any inconvenience caused and hope you will one day return and we are waiting to welcome you in your next visit. Please feel free to be in touch with me directly for any further queries. We look forward in welcoming you soon on your next Holiday.

Thanks and Best regards.

Deepal and Team.
placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text: Dirty, dark, dingy noisy rooms. Arrived and thought this looks nice. Got to the room and had 2 single beds pushed together which they made into a double when requested. Windows to the space they called a balcony were filthy, mould on the curtains, mould and rust around the fridge and in the shower. Cupboard falling apart and a fly in the cocktail I had ordered. Overhead shower did not work and the toilet did not flush efficiently. But we thought let’s give this place a go. Then we went to bed!!! Could not sleep due to the noise from the main road below our ‘balcony’ which was a mouldy dirty space with no chairs that has been clad with slats just to obstruct any light that is much needed to brighten the room. Check out the next morning after having the money deducted from our account as soon as the booking had been placed. $584!!! No refund offered as ‘the money had already been taken’ what a waste, they did offer a room upgrade but not until the final 2 nights of our stay as they had no availability. Did not want to end our fantastic trip to Sri Lanka in such a hovel with a bad taste in our mouth from poor management who lied to booking.com as to avoid any refund. Can get better rooms in the area for $30. Avoid at all costs you will only be disappointed for the overpriced rooms. Also the spa is a joke did not even use my free foot massage after watching a guy inspect the voucher for a few minutes and literally stoke my misses foot for 20 mins in what looked like a maintenance cubicle with a table in it rather than a spa. Also tv did not work which they replaced but still terrible reception, breakfast was cold when we arrived at 8:30 and only opened at 7:30-9:30 also no sun loungers at 8:30 as had been reserved with towels by other guest. Not enough beach in front of hotel to lounge on the beach. Birds on the outside dining tables and sun lounges. Wifi also poor. Massive disappointment and biggest regret of Sri Lanka trip. Worst hotel rooms we had the misfortune of being in left a real bad taste and management not there to talk face to face, would not entertain any partial refund but cut our losses and got out of there so we could enjoy the remainder of our trip.
title: NO NO NO!!! Overpriced, robbing filthole!!!

text: This place is an absolute disgrace !!! We paid $569 to stay here for 4 nights and had 2 check out after 1 night because it was filthy and discusting !! The city veiw is actually a wooden box filled with red paint and mould ! The fridge was full of mould the curtains , again mouldy !!! The shower didnt work ? The tv didnt work !! When we explained we needed to leave as we cant sleep because of the road noise and because the room.is discusting they just point blank refused to give us any kind of refund so basically we paid $569 aud for 1 night in a hell hole !! The managements attitude was beyond appauling !!! I cannot discourage you enough to shop around and not to stay here!!!! Also its impossible 2 get a sun lounger as its full of russians who reserve the beds super early in the morning !!! I hope you enjoy my $569 coral rock and thankyou for ruining the last 5 days of my holiday !!!!
title: Do not stay here !!!!

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
roomTip: I don't think there is a good room
text: Stayed at this hotel for two nights which is right on the beach on one side with a very busy, noisy road on the other side. Struggled to get a good sleep due to constant traffic noise from one side and sound of waves from the other. Light sleepers beware. Room was very basic with a smooth concrete floor and old furniture. Bathroom very small and poor condition. Toiletries supplied consisted of a shower cap and a small piece of soap. Food was buffet style and reasonable selection and quality. Staff were friendly and helpful. Wifi was not available in my bedroom. I would not  recommend this hotel.
title: Really right on the beach

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text:
The concept for this hotel is perfect. And the ocean view is magnificent.
However, the level does not meet your expectations. This is one of the places where almost everything is 60-70% of what you expect. Except for the kindness from the staff who is really trying to do their best. 
On top of that we have prebook’ed our Christmas dinner where excellent food including an enormous variety on the terrace facing the ocean. Unfortunately, it was all spoiled by techno music !! playing at a level that we could hardly speak at the tables. The regular was that more or less everybody had left the dinner two hours later.
I think this hotel could easily get one or two stars more if the management on this hotel were a little bit more efficient.
title: The concept is perfect, but...

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
text:
The most common thing you are waiting from your stay at hotel is clean bed linen, curtains and other cloth stuff. And that is the fail point for this hotel.
Pool is good. Breakfast is not so bad. You can find shared bookshelf on the second floor.

placeInfo/address: 340 Galle Road, Hikkaduwa 80240 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Stay at Coral Sands Hotel instead
text: We had 3 nights planned and left after one.  We would not have stayed here at all if we could have found another place the first night.  We were in a roadside room that was very loud.  The linens were threadbare, the walls were dirty, we didn't even want to sit down in the room.  The halls are concrete so noise really carries.  Drunk Russians yelling in the middle of the night.  There is no beach at all.  I can't imagine staying there and enjoying my holiday.  We moved to the Coral Sands Hotel nearby and had a great oceanfront room for about $25 USD more per night.
title: This place is a dump!

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text:
The Tamarind Tree Hotel

Yatiyana

This was not a nice place to stay. Filthy and unfriendly!

736452214

When we arrived at the hotel we had high expectations. The hotel looked very nice. Then they showed us the room. It was a kind of bungalow with sitting room, bathroom and bedroom. But it all looked very outdated and expired. The bathroom was filthy: hear from previous visitors, soapholder looked as it wasn't washed for a long time. Dead bugs on the floor.
Next day when we came back at lunch the room wasn't done. We asked at reception and they promised us to do so in the afternoon. At evening room still wasn't done. Again reception promised us to do so. The only thing that happened was that we received 2 clean towels!
At the restaurant for breakfast we couldn't sit where we wanted. Although the hotel was almost empty we could not take place at a table by the window because it was a table of 4 and we where with 2. When we mentioned all other 4 person tables at the window where occupied by only 2 people they ignored us. If the restaurant would be overcrowded by visitors i can understand there statement but after us nobody entered the restaurant any more and only 4 tables of the 20 where occupied.
Breakfast was from 7:00 til 9:00. We arrived at 7:10 and a lot of plates on the buffet where already empty.
title: This was not a nice place to stay. Filthy and unfriendly!

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text:
I went there with my friends to Tamarind tree Hotel. We could get only a bad experience at there.
1. The Air condition wasn't work properly after switch on and took more than 1 hour to cool, but it wasn't sufficient. The fan didn't work properly.
2. Rooms are dirty looking. Cupboards are dusty.
3. Towels in the washroom are very dirty.bathroom commode was dirty looking.
5. Foods are very awful.No varieties. No tasty. Very Bad.
6. The welcome juice is very bad.It is not a fresh one.

Please don't go there. It is just wasting your money.

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text: This place was the worst place we stayed while we were in Sri Lanka and we were here for a month. The beds were very really uncomfortable. The room was old and run down and is in desperate need of maintenance. The place smelt like cigarette smoke. The aircon made an awful loud noise all night and the food was not very good. Not very good value for money.The only positive thing is the gardens.
title: Do Not Stay Here

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text: We only stayed here for one night and got in late and left early. A good place to transit. Room was spacious and clean. Bathroom average. Pool looked nice though we didn’t have time to use it. Breakfast was pretty average. While the staff were clearly attempting to give good customer service on check out they didn’t hand back my credit card. I only noticed when in Habarana and sent them an urgent email. 6 days later still no response. There was no suspicious activity on my card and I have cancelled it but to receive no response to such an important question is beyond poor.
title: Bad response times

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text:
Checked in late in what looked like a pretty setting . The chalets are large with sparse and mediocre furniture . The bed was very uncomfortable and no duvet or blankets were provided .

Early morning breakfast was at the restaurant . Reasonably inefficient staff that served cold food. All in all mediocre again.

A beautiful surrounding , awesome trees bit it pretty much stops there .

So much can be done with this property hope the management wakes up !
title: Overnight stay

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text: We locked ourselves out, only one bell boy and he was given misinformation and sent running around to let us in.  From what we saw, I think all the problems at this hotel stem from chaotic management and insufficient, and/or untrained, staff.  food was ok, but nothing special.  As I say, the surroundings and pool area were lovely.
title: Beautiful surroundings and villas BUT chaotic management, ordinary food.  Probably survives because of location near air

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Don't select 6a,
text:
Stayed 1 night on FB basis. First hand experience is wonderful , that is from the reception when booking the hotel via phone and at the check in . 

After that lot of disappointing factors. Started with room having very poor air conditioning and ceiling fans were rotating at snails speed . We found it very difficult to bare as the climate is so warm. 

We Informed reception and after couple of minutes 2 technicians came . We explain the scenario and they checked and called someone and requested to change the room . Then after another 15minutes a lady came , I think she is the house keeper , checked the A/c and Fans again and went off. After about 10 minutes she came again and informed that they are going to change the room. 

These checking should have been done by them before my arrival and wasting guest's time to do their checks is not at all reasonable. 

The entire show took more than good 1- 1 1/2 hours and our evening was half ruined. 

Next is the lunch , nothing to select . Only two options either to go with Nasi Goren or to  go with English something . Its a disaster.
 
Pool is ok & clean, but no life savers where the deep end is 8 feet . Pool attendant is so friendly and helpful. 

After a disappointing lunch we expect something special for dinner . That again it was like a nightmare   nothing much to select . They had a grill corner with only chicken and fish . This is not at all acceptable from a hotel in this caliber. Never seen prawns or crabs or any other meat item during our stay other than Chicken and Fish.

Not much of a difference in  breakfast , so I'm not going to explain more on that . In short it is a total loss . No entertainment , No proper service , No good food , No comforts . Very disappointing stay. 

In our stay we did not notice many guests , may be because of their very poor standards, no one is willing to come here.
title: Not up to standards needs lot of improvements

ownerResponse/text:
Dear Sir,
Noted with thanks and detailed inquiry in this regard is progress.
Warm regards,
Front Office Manager
placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text:
The hotel was booked by SriLankan airlines for transit stay, extremely disappointing stay- number of reasons;
- rooms are not clean 
- no WiFi in rooms

This hotel is definitely not recommended for decent quality stay.
title: Transit stay- disappointing experience

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
roomTip: Try to get one near the main building
text:
The setting of this hotel is wonderful, when we arrived we were ushered in to the reception area and given cooled Tamarind drink to refresh us,  we were then taken to our chalet, this proved to be a 150 metre walk through quite pleasant gardens.  The chalet when we entered was like an oven, the air conditioner fails to work, we finally got it going after about 2 hours.
We then had the long walk back to the main building in the dark to have dinner.  The food was poor and Luke warm, and the bottled Lion Beer I irdered was warm.  The air conditioning and fans were not working in the dining room, which actually resembled a military barracks mess hall.
On returning to our chalet on opening the door and switching on the ligh we were greeted by a very large cockroach and a smaller one.  After doing a clog dance we retired to the hot bed room, you cannot leave the air conditioning on, and had a very bad night on an extremely hard bed.
Stay away!
title: Behind the facade

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text:
We arrived very early morning and only stayed at this hotel due to its closeness. I'd say its a 0 star hotel, and is probably only good for someone staying on a minimum budget or requires a quick stop by the hotel. 
Its not very clean, the rooms smell of cigarettes, the A/C is usually switched off till you arrive in the room and then takes a long while to cool down the room.
Stay here only if you have to.
title: Strange hotel, stayed here only for closeness to airport

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text: The location is gorgeous, the cottages fantastic and the gardens lush. Ponies grazing and birds cheaping it was very relaxing there, I had the tuna steak on arrival for lunch and got severe food poisoning - unfortunately it was a very extreme case and affected me for two weeks. I know it was from this as I had just arrived to Sri Lanka 2 hours before and hadn't eaten elsewhere. Which was really sad as it ruined my experience here, the place is delightful. When I explained how sick I was the manager was not sympathetic and it was only after I was very stern about not paying for the lunch that ruined my holiday did he agree with me - and I was charged a fortune for the water.
title: Amazing space but very bad food poisoning

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text: I was in transit for about four hours so stayed here.The rooms are cottage style rooms. Very spacious. You have to walk in the weather to your rooms at least minimum of five minutes. The breakfast was basic but good.I asked for a wakeup call they did not wake me up thanks to my phone I would have missed the flight.When I complained to the reception on check out both of them at reception did not bother and looked at me as it was my fault did not apologise  very poor service.
title: Don't use for Transit

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text: This hotel can be maintained as a good budget transit hotel. However nobody seems to be very interested in attracting tourists. Striking feature is that the rooms are very dirty and the AC and main electricity switch were very noisy. I will let the photographs explain.
title: Huge Property - Poor service

placeInfo/address: Veyangoda Rd, Katunayake, Negombo 94000 Sri Lanka
text:
Just had one night here - thankfully we arrived late and left early.

The rooms are tatty - the aircon is super noisy, beds are uncomfortable and the towels are small and grey ! 

The staff are pretty useless also.......

On the upside - the gardens are nice.

I really would fine another hotel and certainly would not stay here again
